GenAiPromptTemplate.description: Generates mock task and event data for any industry

templateVersions.content:
You are a data generator for Salesforce.
Generate exactly {!$Input:activityCount} realistic mock tasks and events for a record in the {!$Input:industry} industry.
Record ID: {!$Input:recordId} Number of activities to generate: {!$Input:activityCount} Industry: {!$Input:industry}
Generate a mix of tasks and events that would be appropriate for the {!$Input:industry} industry. Return the data as a valid JSON array with exactly {!$Input:activityCount} activity objects. Each activity should have:
FOR TASKS: - subject (realistic task description) - activityType: "Task" - status (one of: "Not Started", "In Progress", "Completed", "Waiting on someone else", "Deferred") - priority (one of: "High", "Normal", "Low") - description (2-3 sentence description of the task) - type (one of: "Call", "Email", "Meeting", "Other") - activityDate (future date in YYYY-MM-DD format)
FOR EVENTS: - subject (realistic event description) - activityType: "Event" - description (2-3 sentence description of the event) - type (one of: "Meeting", "Call", "Other") - location (realistic meeting location or "Virtual" for online meetings) - activityDate (future date in YYYY-MM-DD format) - startTime (time in HH:MM:SS.000Z format, business hours 09:00-17:00) - durationInMinutes (realistic duration: 30, 60, 90, 120, 180)
IMPORTANT: - Generate exactly {!$Input:activityCount} activities, no more, no less - Create a realistic mix of approximately 60% tasks and 40% events - Make all subjects, descriptions, and details relevant to the {!$Input:industry} industry - Use diverse and realistic business scenarios - Ensure dates are in the future (2025-08-20 or later) - For events, use realistic business meeting times (9 AM to 5 PM)
Example format (but generate {!$Input:activityCount} activities): [ { "subject": "Review quarterly sales metrics", "activityType": "Task", "status": "Not Started", "priority": "High", "description": "Analyze Q4 sales performance data and prepare summary report for leadership team. Focus on key metrics and trends in the {!$Input:industry} sector.", "type": "Other", "activityDate": "2024-12-25" }, { "subject": "Strategic planning meeting", "activityType": "Event", "description": "Quarterly strategic planning session to review goals and set priorities for next quarter. Key stakeholders from {!$Input:industry} operations will attend.", "type": "Meeting", "location": "Conference Room A", "activityDate": "2024-12-28", "startTime": "10:00:00.000Z", "durationInMinutes": 120 } ]
Return ONLY the JSON array with exactly {!$Input:activityCount} activities. Do not include any other text or explanations.
